content: Hilina Abebe is one of the most talented female journalist i know recently and it is really fascinating to see her inspiring works internationally published. She is living the dream and on the go. I am currently in the DMV area of the US and it always fascinate me how Ethiopians captivate their cultural identity and integrate to the American lifestyle. As most of my friends are Ethiopians living for a while here, I have experienced most of the activities in here and more. And to see them well told visually and articled, it really fascinated me. Keep documenting!
